long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"SearchAdvisor" is a new browser extension designed to give your everyday browsing experience a beautiful new look. With SearchAdvisor, your browser's first page will no longer be a dull search bar, search box, but instead a stunning visual experience.

Once you install SearchAdvisor, you can customize your new tab by selecting your favorite background image from our vast image library. Temperature, date, time is an inherent attribute of the page and does not break any rules. It only enhances UI/UX extensions. We are confident that you will enjoy using SearchAdvisor as much as we do.
